name: ads.txt lab
author: ads.txtlab

sections.description: ads.txt lab is the easiest way to setup and manage your ads.txt file. The ads.txt file allows advertisers to verify the traffic that they buy from your website and therefore reduces adfraud.
sections.installation: Simple installation. Install our plugin in your WordPress, get your ads.txt lab ID for free at www.adstxtlab.com and insert the ID in the plugin settings. That’s all!
sections.faq:
FAQ

Installation Instructions

Simple installation. Install our plugin in your WordPress, get your ads.txt lab ID for free at www.adstxtlab.com and insert the ID in the plugin settings. That’s all!
